title.narrative: Sustaining the rapid growth of China's Green Bond Market

description.narrative: The project is designed to draw upon the UK's leadership in global financial markets to sustain the rapid growth of China's Green Bond Market, which involves proceeds of bonds being allocated to environmental projects, and contributes to reduction of emissions. It is intended to enhance the connection between China's domestic green bond market and the international market. It is also intended to establish green bonds as a tool for China to tap into international capital markets to finance low-carbon and climate resilient projects, which would open up opportunities for international business, including UK companies.
